subject: Help with a order
description_text:
Hello mate ,

I want to know if it’s was your order because I need to pay customers fees

https://del.dhl.com/FR/-jyKCWtRio6

conversations.body_text: Hi Nathanaël Mullier,     Sorry, our IOSS number is not valid, we have refunded you the tax charged in advance, please check it out.
